ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Both Shadow Cat and Snow Tech saw all of the charges heading towards the reptile warrior and know that it wasn t fair for all of the enemy to gang up on him

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
From: "A.J. Gould" <black_panther_kitten@...>

Both Shadow Cat and Snow Tech saw all of the charges
heading towards the reptile warrior and know that it
wasn't fair for all of the enemy to gang up on him
like that, Snow Tech aimed his lightning gun towards
the enemy and begins to fire in a spray
fashion...where no bot could miss being hit!
Shadow Cat growled at the enemy as she then reached
behind and came up with a splatter gun and began to
fire in the same fashion as her brother. The two's
weapons sending more then 30 charges into the field
and towards the enemy in a spray formation...no enemy
would escape unscathed!
